text: I was wondering is there a way to update the auto included JS to use the latest version of jQuery?
not unless you do something hacky like use the "replace" hubl filter on the standard header includes

Not sure where this should go, but Iâ€™m noticing that if add your Facebook pixel in the backend of HubSpot (under Content Settings > Ads > Pixel) the code that HubSpot adds to your site is actually adding your pixel twice and causes issues with Facebook reporting (and no, when I tested this, I was not adding the pixel manually somewhere else :stuck_out_tongue: )
Hey <@U7AU6414J>! Can you send me a link to where it's loading twice?

I can send a page, but I removed the pixel and now have it added manually, i can revert, but we currently have some facebook campaigns running, so i dont want to revert and cause data issues <@UBFA10FMF>
Ahh, gotcha <@U7AU6414J>. I'll touch base with that team and see if I can repro from here. Thanks for flagging!
